name: Mixer Truck Racing & Driving
description:
Feeling a little rusty?
You think you've mastered All the Trucker Games ?
Wait a minute Time to test your skills with a REAL BIG Concrete Mixer Truck. This Construction Vehicle will give you the new realistic Experience.It is a big, long and heavy truck that takes some careful positioning to get around.

What are you waiting for?
HOP IN and TRUCK ON
